name: Absinthe
effect:
Elf • House Calix
Order: Once per turn, Absinthe may make a skill test (DC 12). If successful, search your deck for a spell that Absinthe may cast, show it to the other players, and add it to your hand. If unsuccessful, Absinthe suffers one wound.
They serve, that they might live... and one day, my beloved, you will join my beautiful pets...

name: Alesandressa
effect:
Elf
Spend Order: Perform two consecutive +4 ranged strikes.
"The elves call her the 'Lady of the Will'o'wisps', but I don't recommend you call her anything. If you tried, you'd already be too close." - Basil Nemis

name: Alia
effect:
Free Kingdoms • House Rowan
Alia gains +4 ATK when making a melee strike against a spent opponent.
In the end we will remember not the words of our enemies but the silence of our friends.

name: Amulet of Illusion
effect:
React: Spend the Amulet of Illusion before a melee strike roll targeting this character, the strike automatically misses.
Brindle's trinket even has the power to make her seem lovely and kind... but not for long.

name: Anandale's Armor
effect:
Armor
React: Spend Anandale's Armor after a melee strike roll or ranged strike roll targeting this character. The die is rerolled.
"Anandale was the strongest Knight in the Empire, the best of us. But now his time has passed... " - Lord Gahid

name: Andover's Quill
effect:
Weapon • Unique
Only Free Kingdoms may equip.
While equipped this characters gains +1 hit point and an extra melee strike when attacking equal to his or her highest ATK strike.
Order: Discard to ready this character
"The book of freedom is written with steel, and drawn in the blood of loyal men." - King Michael of Andover

name: Angus Hammerfall
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Exile
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
I don't work for you human. I came to fight evil, and you just happened to be going the same way.

name: Artheon
effect:
Elf • House Syneri
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
The end of life is the beginning of wisdom, human. What you stole from us long ago, we will now teach you to fear.

name: Ash
effect:
Dwarf
Order: Discard two cards from your hand to move Ash backward one rank.
"He should have excellent footwork. He practices it every time he retreats." - Guardian

name: Assassination
effect:
React: Play before this rogue makes a melee strike roll targeting a spent opponent. The strike roll is automatically a 'natural 20' and inflicts an additional wound.
"Night is the darker half of life, Logan. Never turn your back on it. Or me." - Black Tom of Corinth

name: Aura of Protection
effect:
React: Play after this cleric is targeted with an action (not a strike). The action is canceled.
"Alia, like the miserable humans she protects will die. The children of Syneri will see to it soon enough." - Elenitakis

name: Axe
effect:
Dwarf
Axe has +2 ATK while he is adjacent to Hammer.
Darkness rots the mountains beneath us. If the uplanders will not fight it then by Kor, we shall fight them!

name: Backstab
effect:
React: Play before this rogue makes a melee strike roll. If the rogue's opponent is spent, the rogue gains +5 ATK for this strike, and the strike inflicts an additional wound if it hits.
"Twenty Elves for every one of us. It's not fighting dirty - it's fighting smart." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Bag of Holding
effect:
Order: Spend the Bag of Holding and discard a card from your hand to draw a
card.
"An old man in Baraxton used to use it to smuggle beer past his wife, but I've got other ideas... " - Basil Nemis

name: Balian
effect:
Mercenary • Priest of Bascaron
Mercenaries adjacent to Balian have +2 AC.
The moons are changing, and if you open yourself to their power, they will give you strength.

name: Balmtear's Potion
effect:
A character may not equip more than one Balmtear's Potion per game.
React: Discard Balmtear's Potion after this character suffers wounds. Reduce the wounds by one.
"Filthy books can't teach you anything. To learn, you must experiment!" - L'sara.

name: Banish the Wound
effect:
Spend React: Play immediately after a character suffers wounds. Reduce the wounds by one.
"The evil that men do never dies with them. It must be purged with the fires of truth." - Faith

name: Baqbou Umbala
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Seer • Narawat • Priest of Amoudosi
Spend Order: Target a character in your army. Baqbou switches places with the
target character.
"One can never be too swift to save his brother."

name: Bar Fight
effect:
Spend Order: This fighter targets a 1st rank character in an opposing army. The fighter performs a melee strike against the target, regardless of this fighters current rank.
Sometimes a peasant's tool can be a warrior's greatest weapon.

name: Barbed Lash
effect: React: Play before you bring a character into play. If your Warlord is Evil, the character does not suffer a loyalty penalty. "All they needs is a bit o'persuasion."

name: Basil Nemis
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Basil gains +4 AC if all other armies have more characters in their 1st rank than your army has in its 1st rank.
"Basil used to be the best second-story man in Baraxton, 'til Logan's wild ideas ruined 'im." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Battle Axe
effect:
Weapon • React: Spend the Battle Axe before this character makes a melee strike roll. If the strike's target has a Shield equipped, it is discarded.
"The dwarves marched out of the mountains just below the Deverenian city of Phrygai. They killed two ambassadors sent to turn them away, and from then on, it was open war." - Johan Halfblood

name: Baudwyn Troubador
effect:
Deverenian • Bard
"He will sing thee songs of treason and deceit, as best suits an Emperor's fireside... " - Princess Dashkova

name: Below the Helm
effect:
React: Play after a melee strike by this rogue hits a character. The character is stunned instead of wounded.
"Where the helm meets the gorget, there's a hole just big enough for a swordblade. Deverenians don't like us knowing about it, but it just might save your life." - Lieutenant Dunbar

name: Belt of Heroes
effect:
+2 skill.
Only the finest of the Northern Tribes can wear it. Every five years, the tribes would gather to allow their bravest to compete in the challenges. I wonder what will happen to it, now that the tribes have scattered to the winds.

name: Bishop Koenraad
effect:
Deverenian • Priest of the Storm
Other Deverenians in this rank have +2 AC.
"They shall sink into the salt sea, seven hundred knights, keen men of war found cold and dead and only the Empire shall be spared." - the Annales Devereniorum

name: Blade of Syneri
effect:
Weapon • Unique
Only Mercenaries may equip.
While equipped this characters gains +1 hit point and an extra melee strike when attacking equal to his or her highest ATK strike.
Order: Discard to ready this character.
Wrought by the Archmage Syneri, the blade is said to be forged from a piece of Bascaron's own shadow.

name: Blast
effect:
Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
"When the Nothrog march, we conquer the world. The Accordlands will soon be guided by the iron fist of true law." - Rren'the

name: Bless
effect:
Order: Target a character in this cleric's army. The target gains +4 AC until the end of the turn.
Spend React: Play before a melee strike roll targeting a character in this cleric's army. The character gains +4 AC for this strike.
"The humans do not yet know us, Faith," Gnorrow said. "Give them time, and they will understand."

name: Blind
effect:
Order: This cleric targets a character in the 1st rank. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or have their ATK changed to -5 until the end of the turn.
"'S a foolish idea, human. Even wi'out eyes, Nothrog can still smell you." - Gorzhek

name: Blink
effect:
React: Play after this wizard is targeted by another character with a melee strike, ranged strike, or action. If the wizard succeeds with a skill check (DC 14), the wizard moves to a different rank and the strike or action is canceled.
"Where she was, she was not, and where she was not, she was." - Lucien Stormcrow

name: Bloodstained Dagger
effect:
Weapon • React: Discard Bloodstained Dagger after this character is targeted by a spell. The spell is canceled.
"In the legends, it's called 'Elfbane'. If it helps me kill them, I'll call it useful." - Kenia

name: Bloodsteed
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend the Bloodsteed to move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Discard the Bloodsteed to move to any rank.
"Sins cast long shadows, if your eyes are sharp." - Nassiral Hate

name: Blue Willow Wand
effect:
Order: Target an adjacent character and discard the Blue Willow Wand to remove one wound from that character.
"Blue willow's been used for healing since the days when Andover left the Empire, long before even my grandmother's birth." - Zoe

name: Bracers of Hember
effect:
Shield • React: Discard the Bracers after a melee strike roll targeting this character. The strike automatically fails.
"There are truths that can kill a nation. Hember knew that, Gnorrow. Why can you not see it, before it is too late?" - Faith

name: Brindle
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Marsh Hag
Spend Order: Look at the top 10 cards of your deck. If one of those cards has the word "potion" in the title, you may show it to the other players and add it to your hand. Shuffle the remaining cards back into your deck.
Her hideous appearance is matched only by her foul, cold heart.

name: Brine Fiend
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
"Bascaron, the broken moon, passes closer to our mountains with each day, leaving behind abominations that once were beasts." - Rahku Mennanakh

name: Bruin Lenoire
effect:
Deverenian • Illusionist • Myerdeth
Spend react: Before a Deverenian makes a melee strike roll, he or she gains +3 ATK for this strike.
Thinkest thou that sorcerers of the Empire serve dark forces? Tis not true. Some of us see the sun within the Storm.

name: Bruntor's Helm
effect:
Helm • This character gains +1 hit point while Bruntor's Helm is equipped.
"Walking up the mountain wearies you less than a stone in your boot. Small
things can conquer large ones." - Dwarven proverb

name: Buckler
effect:
Shield
"A legion of Nothrog took the field that day, against half as many humans. Though Llyr fought bravely, they could only stave off the inevitable: Farhaven was burned, the Five Cities destroyed in flame." - Serah ni Fhionn

name: Bull Strength
effect:
Order: Target a character in this cleric's army. The target gains +3 ATK until the end of the turn.
"Our camp was ambushed by these creatures. We dragged out our dead for burial... but judging by the creatures' cooking fires, we didn't get them all." - Guardian

name: Burning Hands
effect:
Order: Until the end of this turn, immediately before a melee strike roll targeting this wizard, the wizard performs a melee strike against his or her opponent with an ATK of +5.
"Burn, and let the souls of the dead hear your screams!"

name: Calm
effect:
Spend Order: This cleric targets a character of equal or lower level in the 1st rank of another army. Spend the target character.
"Iron rusts from disuse, and yea, even so does inaction sap the vigors of the mind." - Bishop Koenraad

name: Caltrops
effect:
Spend Order: Can only be performed by a rogue in the 1st rank. Until the end of the turn, this rogue has the ability "React: Once per strike, before a melee strike roll targeting a character in this rank perform a melee strike with an ATK of +0 (+3 versus characters with a Steed equipped) targeting the opponent."
"Don't worry about us being followed. I've got that part covered." - Devon Harper

name: Catapult Crew
effect:
Nothrog • Siege
Catapult Crew cannot equip items.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike that may target a character up to 3 ranks away.
"Fire!"

name: Cause Fear
effect:
React: Play before a melee strike roll targeting this cleric. The cleric's opponent must succeed with a magic save (DC 15 + this cleric's level) or the strike automatically fails.
"Execution is a punishment; cruelty is an example. A proper torture educates the masses. Death teaches only one man." - Nassiral Hate

name: Chain Lightning
effect: Spend Order: Select a target for a +7 ranged strike, then target a 2nd character in the rank behind the 1st, and a 3rd target in the rank behind the 2nd. Chain Lightning strikes cause 2 wounds. If the 1st strike kills its target, perform a +4 range strike against the 2nd target. If the 2nd strike kills its target, perform a +0 ranged strike against the 3rd target.

name: Chain Mail
effect:
Armor • Fighter and Cleric only.
"You humans call this armor? Bah! Give me three feet of ironcloth - I'll run from here to the Caves of Duughn, and break your swords to boot!" - Guardian

name: Charge
effect:
Order: Move this fighter forward one rank.
"Onward! For Hate, and for glory!" The Nothrog charged down the Four Hills of Baraxton, and fire roared from their siege machines.

name: Charm Person
effect:
Order: This wizard targets a character of lower level. That character may not attack this turn.
"The daughter of the Emperor hath no need of shields to keep her safe on the battlefield. She doth need only her standard, and her wit. Most men would die for less." - Sir Beatrix

name: Circle of Protection
effect:
Order: Target this cleric or a character in this or an adjacent rank. The target gains +6 AC and +6 to magic saves until the end of the turn.
"Stand within a circle of arms, each a shield to the others, and Neus will do the rest." - Frederik Lahr

name: Claw
effect:
Dwarf • Cavebear Master
Study the bear. Seek peace, walk quietly, but if enemies threaten, send them to their graves.

name: Cleave
effect:
React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. If the strike hits, the fighter inflicts an additional wound.
"You live in a forest elf. Forests can be cut down." - Husuk

name: Come Get Some
effect:
Order: Until this fighter is killed or the turn ends, other characters in the same rank can't be targeted with melee strikes. Until the turn ends, this fighter can be targeted with melee strikes regardless of card effects.
If you aren't with us, you're against us.

name: Cordeos
effect:
Elf • Necromancer • House Dythanus
Spend Order: Target a character up to 3 ranks away. Cordeos and the target each suffer one wound.
Humanity is a disease that we will boil down to clean, white bone.

name: Count Damien
effect:
Deverenian • Huntsman
There is no beast so fierce that he does not know some mercy, some pity. I know none, and therefore, I am no beast.

name: Critical Strike
effect:
React: Play after this fighter fails a melee strike roll. You may reroll the strike.
"Magic, prayers, cunning... these things cannot save you from the Sword." - Sethusk

name: Crystalsphere Staff
effect:
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike that can target any character in play, regardless of ranks.
"Faith is your guide; Neus will not cast away an innocent man." - Frederik Lahr

name: Cure Lethal Wounds
effect:
Spend Order: This cleric targets a character and removes all wounds from that character.
Spend React: Play after a character suffers wounds. This cleric reduces the number of wounds to zero.
"You killed the human that did this, yes? Good. Then I will heal you." - Xiat

name: Cure Serious Wounds
effect:
Spend Order: This cleric targets a character in this rank. Remove one wound from that character.
"Next time, Dunbar, get out of the way. Robert can take care of himself." - Frederik Lahr

name: Dagger
effect:
Weapon
Spend Order: Discard the Dagger to perform a +0 ranged strike.
Order: If this character is a rogue, discard the Dagger to perform a +0 ranged strike.
"I saw Sir Gahid charge a legion of Nothrog once. He returned. They didn't. That, my lord, is all I need to know." - Squire Kelanor

name: Dakat
effect:
Nothrog • Uthanak's Legion
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
Send me against the Deverenians, Uthanak, and my skyfire will cut them down.
I hunt them for their pretty clothes, and their pretty screams.

name: Darian Windson
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Ranger
Order: Once per turn, perform a +0 ranged strike.
My sword belonged to my father, killed by the Elves, and my throwing dagger once guarded my poor Baraxton wife. One day, I will find the Nothrog who took her, and I will pay him in steel and blood.

name: Darius
effect:
Deverenian • Blacksmith
Darius and Deverenians adjacent to him are +1 level for equipping Weapons.
"With each battle, men die, and more soldiers have need for swords. War is good for business, son. Remember that."

name: Death Blow
effect:
Order: This fighter does not become spent the next time he or she attacks. The fighter is killed at the end of this turn.
"There are two true deaths, uplander - the center of the earth, and the Great Storm. You fight your enemies above; we fight ours below." - Axe

name: Demon of Kvar
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Spend Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike. If the strike is successful, the target is stunned instead of wounded.
"The beasts have destroyed three caravans this year. If I didn't know better, I should think the blasted things were intelligent, and tying to ruin me." - Maxmillian

name: Deverenian Hound
effect:
Order: When in the 1st rank, spend the Hound to have it attack as a level 1 fighter with AC 10, 1 hit point, and ATK of +5.
"The only thing worse than the dogs is their infernal Master." - Husuk

name: Deverenian Shield
effect:
Shield • Fighter and cleric only.
 This character may not use multiple strikes.
"They call Robert the hero of the Andover Wars. I call him meat, and nothing more." - Uthanak

name: Devon Harper
effect:
Mercenary • Nightwalker
"You hired me to silence him, your honor. I assure you, dead men don't speak."

name: Dirge
effect:
Dwarf
Dirge is +1 level for equipping items.
"He wears the blue of the cleric caste but his heart burns red with thoughts
of war." - Prince Alaric

name: Dispel Magic
effect:
React: Play after a spell is cast. This wizard and the caster both roll a die and add their skill to the roll. If this wizard's total is higher, the spell is canceled.
"Without marrow, bones shatter. Elves without magic do the same." - Rren'the

name: Distraction
effect:
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, only higher-level characters may target this rogue with melee strikes.
"Ah, the old vine-across-the-path trick. I've seen this more times than I can count... wonder why they thought it'd work today?"

name: Divine Guidance
effect:
Order: Discard a card from your hand to ready this cleric.
"You can be taught religion. You can never be taught faith." - Frederik Lahr

name: Divine Intervention
effect:
Spend React: Play after an action (not a strike) targets a character in this cleric's army. The character generating the action must make a magic save (DC 18) or the action is canceled.
"All the races of the Lands of the Accord trust in divinity... save the Dwarves, who pray to their below-ground demons, drink blood, and drown in stone." - Bishop Koenraad

name: Divine Protection
effect: Order: This cleric targets a character. Until the end of the turn, the target has the ability "Spend React: Before a melee strike roll targeting this character, make a melee strike roll targeting the opponent."

name: Dodge
effect:
React: Play before a melee strike or ranged strike roll targeting this rogue. The rogue gains +8 AC until the end of this strike.
"You've got a great big sword, and still that's the best a Baraxton guard has to offer? Here, let's see what my little ones can do." - Keziah

name: Duncan Kinslayer
effect:
Dwarf • Exile
Duncan has -1 AC for each other character in his rank.
"He'd best find his path among the humans-there's no time for redemption underground" - Poison

name: Dwarven Signet
effect:
Order: Spend the Dwarven Signet to give this character +5 AC until the end of the turn.
"Best not let the Dwarves see you with that. They might start wondering how you got it." - Sali

name: Edge of Silverflame
effect:
Weapon • Unique
Only Elves may equip
While equipped this characters gains +1 hit point and an extra melee strike when attacking equal to his or her highest ATK strike.
Order: Discard to ready this character.
All things pass away. We elves, who burn more brightly than you, die all the more swiftly for it.

name: Elaneor Tremayne
effect:
Deverenian • Lady of Tremayne
Elaneor is +1 level for using rogue action cards.
"The blasphemous Elf that marred her mother is long since dead, but her halfbreed brother still lives. If the lady will not reveal him, then I will hunt him down and purge the Accordlands of their defiant blood." - Count Damien

name: Elenitakis
effect:
Elf • House Syneri • Priest of Blood
Spend Order: Target a character, who gains +4 ATK until the end of the turn.
One sip, my friend, and all thoughts of mortality will be gone forever.

name: Extensions
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard lets you look at the top five cards of your deck. You may put one in your hand. Return the remaining cards to either the top or bottom of your deck, in any order.
"They have forgotten the blood and the pain. They have forgotten why the Storm gathers, and that will be their undoing... " - Sorscha

name: Faith
effect:
Dwarf
A mountain does not need allies. It needs roots, and it needs strength. Nothing more.

name: Faith Will Provide
effect:
Order: This rogue may immediately equip an item that he or she could not normally equip because of class. The item is discarded at the end of the turn.
"Peace... at any price." - Gnorrow Yar

name: Fenris
effect:
Nothrog • You must spend a wizard to bring Fenris into play.
Order: Kill a character in your army to give Fenris +3 ATK until the end of the turn.
"All Nothrog legions have a totem. If enough of their legionnaires give blood and their shaman knows the spell, they can give it form... and use its power to destroy us." - Darian Windson

name: Fethinos
effect:
Elf • Priest of Bone
"Tell Sir Robert that I'm returning the blade he left behind!" The dagger sank into the human's flesh, and as it did, the woods echoed with mortal screams

name: Fett Anjaran
effect:
Mercenary •  Summoner
Order: Once per turn, target a character in this or an adjacent rank who gains +2 ATK until the end of the turn.
"Fett, the wizard. He did chant, and methinks a scream that was not my own did escape my soul. I fear he put a spirit within me that day, one that will never leave my shadowed heart." - Lady Ersane

name: Final Stand
effect: Spend Order: If this fighter is in the 1st rank, target any number of characters in another army's 1st rank. The fighter performs consecutive melee strikes against each target with a penalty to his or her ATK equal to the number of targets. If the fighter fails to kill a target with a strike, the remaining strikes are lost.

name: Finesse
effect:
React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. If this fighter has a Weapon equipped, the AC bonus of the opponents items are negated for this strike.
"That's two, human. How many more do you have in your quarrel? I'll wager it isn't enough." - Lathos

name: Fireridge Cyclops
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Cyclops has -2 to perception skill checks. You may not spend Cyclops to move as an Order.
The greatest trackers in the Shattered Mountains. Once a cyclops has your trail, he'll follow you from Baraxton to Sadrasheer, from Myreth to the caves of the dwarves, and he'll never let you go.

name: Flame Arrows
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard targets one or two characters that are up to two ranks away and adjacent to each other. Select the order of attack, then this wizard performs a +2 ranged strike against each target.
"Everyone dies. Just set them on fire, Quinthe. You will see." - High Queen Tepheroth

name: Follow Through
effect:
React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. If this fighter's opponent does not have Armor equipped, this fighter gains +5 ATK for this strike.
Tepheroth's guard set fire to the Rowan estates, but too late. Before she could destroy them, the Deverenians seized Rowan Palace... dangerously close to Myreth.

name: Frederik Lahr
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Priest of Neus
Spend React: Before a character in this rank makes a melee strike roll, give
the character +2 ATK for this strike.
The Elves have burned our temples, but they will never tear down our faith.

name: Frenzied Skirmish
effect: Spend Order: This fighter gains +8 AC until the end of the turn. The fighter is killed at the end of the turn

name: Full Plate
effect:
Armor
"No sword can pierce Deverenian plate. Where you see a knight, run. That's about the best defense you have." - Palethis

name: Gabriel of Llyr
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Llyr
Gabriel of Llyr gains +3 AC while he is the target of a melee strike or ranged strike by a character with a Steed equipped and +3 ATK while attacking a character with a Steed equipped.
War is death's feast.

name: Giant Growth
effect:
React: Play before a character in this wizard's army makes a melee strike roll. The character gains +3 ATK until the end of the turn.
"It ate ten men and three horses before it shrank back to size. I've never seen anything like it, and I never wish to again!"

name: Gift From Above
effect:
Order: This cleric targets a character in play. That character gains ATK and AC bonuses equal to this cleric's level until the end of the turn.
"Kor is the stone that holds, the axe that cuts, and the hand that wields. Kor is the eye that sees in the darkness, and Kor is the shield that defends us. By the blood of my father, I will bring victory home." - Dwarven battle-prayer

name: Glyph of Fate
effect:
Order: Discard the Glyph to make the next roll your army makes a 'natural 20.'
All the races agree on this: in the beginning, the world was formed by the power of words.

name: Gnorrow Yaw
effect:
Dwarf Warlord • Unique • Priest of Kor
Spend Order: Discard a card from your hand to search your deck for a card with the Gargoyle trait, show it to the other players, then add it to your hand.
If you risk nothing, you risk everything.

name: Gorzhek
effect:
Nothrog • Berserker
Crack bone! Tear flesh! Death will follow with bloodstained hands, and the
gods will see Nothrog strength!

name: Great Cleave
effect:
React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. The fighter's opponent suffers one wound.
"Dwarves are never defeated. They can only be killed"

name: Grey Elf's Gratitude
effect:
Spend Order: This cleric targets a character in your discard pile. Put the character into your hand.
"In whispered words, she spoke her name... Navdai. She brought me back to life. Aye, an Elf... and something greater. I know no more than that." - Bruin Lenoire

name: Grimsteel
effect:
Weapon • Unique
Only Nothrog may equip.
While equipped this characters gains +1 hit point and an extra melee strike when attacking equal to his or her highest ATK strike.
Order: Discard to ready this character.
"It is a death worse than being burned in a forge fire, and life eternal within
hard-forged steel." - Krun

name: Guardian
effect:
Dwarf
"None shall pass"

name: Gueniveure
effect:
Elf • House Glyn
Spend Order: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
"I have lived nearly thirty years, and my life is at an end. Yet before I die, I have one wish: to see the power of the Dragon Storm."

name: Halberdier
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Your army gains +1 to its initiative roll.
The kingdom of Andover has fallen to the elves, and Llyr is aflame as well! There is nothing left in the south, Gen'ral - nothing but blood and bone!

name: Hammer
effect:
Dwarf
Hammer has +2 AC while he is adjacent to Axe.
Words are fine for those who have time to waste their breath.

name: Hammer of Peronor
effect:
Weapon • This character inflicts an additional wound whenever he or she hits characters of opposite alignment with a melee strike.
"It is said that Peronor, Templar of Llyr, was betrayed and murdered. I do not know if it is true, but I have never seen the weapon unstained with blood, no matter how you clean it." - Keziah

name: Hamstring
effect:
React: Play before this rogue makes a melee strike roll. The rogue makes an
additional melee strike to the same target with ATK equal to the impending
strike roll. If the additional strike hits, it does not cause a wound, but the
target suffers a -5 AC penalty until the end of the turn.

name: Hassimal
effect:
Elf • Assassin
Order: Spend Hassimal and another character in your army to draw a card.
"It's easy to pick the pockets of a dead man."

name: Healing Potion
effect:
A character may not equip more than one Healing Potion per game.
Order: Discard to remove one wound from a character in this rank.
React: Discard when a character in this rank is suffering wounds. Reduce the wounds to zero.
"Who cares where it came from, as long as it works!" - Devon Harper

name: Hember's Fist
effect:
Weapon • Unique
Only Dwarves may equip.
While equipped this characters gains +1 hit point and an extra melee strike
when attacking equal to his or her highest ATK strike.
Order: Discard to ready this character.
"Honor can be purchased only with vigilance, and with courage." - Hember, First Dwarven Hethrhod.

name: Hiding in Plain Sight
effect:
Order: Characters of equal or lower level may not target this rogue with melee strikes. This effect ends when this rogue attacks, performs an order, or when the turn ends - whichever comes first.
The assassination of the Andover King sealed the fate of his nation. After that, the Elves took the city as easily as a wave crashing on the shore... leaving nothing behind but the empty sand.

name: Holy Energy
effect:
Spend Order: This cleric targets a spent character in this or an adjacent rank. The character is readied, but may not attack if he or she has already attacked this turn.
"Come home, Timothy, to your father Jorel and I. You are too young, and I am too old to see you die." - Mara Windson

name: Husuk
effect:
Nothrog • Unique • Krun's Legion
React: Immediately after Husuk inflicts a wound on a spent character with a melee strike, he may melee strike that character again. This ability may be used any number of times per turn.
Elves deserve no honor. Like the bones they wear, they are already dead.

name: I Have Your Back
effect:
React: Play after a character in the same rank as this fighter is targeted with a melee strike or ranged strike. The fighter becomes the new target.
"My mother taught me not to fear thunder, Deverenian, and I've seen nothing to convince me that this 'Storm' of yours is a god." - Dakat

name: Ice Bolt
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to three ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 16) or suffer one wound.
"Ice, like all forces of nature, is even more deadly when controlled by the intellect of a sorcerer." - Fett Anjaran

name: If You Still Breathe...
effect:
React: Play before this rogue makes a melee strike roll. If this rogue and his or her opponent are both still alive after the strike, the rogue may immediately make an additional melee strike targeting the opponent.
"I got him! I got... " - Dieter the Slow

name: Imperial Guard
effect:
Deverenian
Imperial Guard has +2 ATK and +2 AC while Princess Dashkova is in play.
"It is said that the Imperial Guardsmen can see the world through the eyes of their hawks. Most people think that's ridiculous. I know better." - Sali

name: Improvised Weapon
effect:
React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. The fighter gains +3 ATK for this strike. The fighter has a Weapon for this strike (even if he or she already had one equipped).
I may not make it out of this cursed mine, elf - but neither will you.

name: Inferno
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard targets one to three different characters that are up to two ranks away and adjacent to each other. Select the order of attack, then this wizard performs a +5 ranged strike to each target.
"Rathe was sworn to Alia, and pledged to Rowan... until Tepheroth condemned the House. Now his love has turned to hate, and fire to ice." - Fethinos

name: Jack of All Trades
effect:
Order: This rogue is +1 level until the end of the turn.
"A shovel? A pair of marching boots? Is that an anvil? By Kor! What else have ye got in that bag, lad?" - Hammer

name: Jigoral
effect:
Elf
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
"Never steal from a Deverenian sorcerer, or you'll end up like Jigoral, muttering in unknown tongues and possessed by a thousand demons." - Valanthe

name: Johan Halfblood
effect:
Mercenary • Half-elf
Spend React: Immediately after you perform an order, perform another order.
"I hate the Elves. If I could, I'd steal my father's blood back from them. Because I cannot, I'll have to be satisfied with theirs"

name: Jump
effect:
Order: Move this wizard forward or backward one rank.
"Three battles, and still you escape our best trackers. You owe us a death, Logan... preferably your own." - Lucien Stormcrow

name: Kenia
effect:
Nothrog
Kenia gets +2 AC while she has a Weapon equipped.
"Half-human?" Orochoff snarled, "Call her that yourself, I want to live to see the sun set."

name: Kerebrus
effect:
Mercenary Warlord • Unique
Kerebrus is both a fighter and a cleric. Kerebrus enters play from your hand as if he were level 5.
"No soldier can stand alone."

name: Keridwen
effect:
Mercenary • Tribe of Stags
Spend Order: Perform a +4 ranged strike.
"A peacocks feather for each of your eyes, Deverenian. Too bad your side couldn't spare more gold... "

name: Keziah
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Bard
When I was born, the clerics of my father's city claimed I had a destiny to fulfill. I've never waited around long enough to find out what it was. Life is too short to wait for fate to find you; you have to keep moving, and hope it catches up.

name: King Xod
effect:
Dwarf Warlord • Unique
Dwarves in your army are +1 level for equipping items.
Order: Once per turn, search your deck for an item of level 5 or less, show it to the other players, then add it to your hand.
"I have buried three sons, I will not bury a nation."

name: Knowledge
effect:
Dwarf
Order: Kill Knowledge to search your deck for a card with the Gargoyle trait. Show it to the other players, then place the Gargoyle on top of the deck.
No, Alaric, you are wrong. Strength is in the will, the power of the mind and the conviction of the spirit. Perhaps one day you will see.

name: Kohn Peacehand
effect:
Dwarf • Unique
Spend Order: Target a character in this or an adjacent rank. Remove one wound from that character.
Mercy should be mined from the heart as ore is dug from the mountains. With time, a vein can be opened, and the world will change.

name: Krun
effect:
Nothrog Warlord • Unique
Krun inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.
Steel your hearts and ready shield! To victory, or to death!

name: L'Sara
effect:
Nothrog • Krun's Legion • Saboteur
They die easy, these humans. Easier than beasts, who at least have the sense to hide when the hunter comes.

name: Lady Beatrix
effect:
Deverenian • Aedroud
"Beatrix has her honor, but Rellion ne'er will let her forget the terrible price she paid to restore it." - Lord Anandale

name: Lady Ersane
effect:
Mercenary • The Knight of the Steel Rose
Ersane gains +2 AC while spent.
"You must face dangerous temptations if you travel the road to the Empire of Storms... " - Basil Nemis

name: Lady Meleagrance
effect:
Deverenian • Knight of the Moon
She will give her oath to no house, but claims that she has sworn herself to a higher calling...

name: Lathos
effect:
Elf • House Calix
React: Once per strike, after a melee strike against Lathos, Lathos may make a melee strike against his opponent.
"Too slow, human. You lose the other ear. Would you like to try a third time, or would that be too humiliating for you?"

name: Leather Cap
effect:
Helm
"Protect your head, dunderbrain, or the Nothrog will eat it." - Ash

name: Leveled!
effect: React: Play after a character in your army kills another player's character of equal or higher level with a melee strike, ranged strike, or action. Attach this card to your character. As long as this card is attached, the character is +1 level, and gains the following bonuses: +3 ATK, +3 AC, +1 hit point, and +2 skill.

name: Lieutenant Dunbar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Unique • Andover
React: If Dunbar is adjacent to Sir Robert when Robert is suffering wounds,
you may apply the wounds to Dunbar instead.
"I followed Robert through the burned fields of Llyr, and the ruins of once-mighty Corinth. If he leads me into death, it will just be one more journey I am willing to take by his side"

name: Logan Ebonwoulfe
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord • Unique • Scout
React: Once per turn, after another player makes a melee strike roll, that
player must reroll the die.
I was born free. I will die the same.

name: Loner
effect:
Dwarf
"It's not right for a Dwarf to live alone. It's unnatural." - Kohn Peacehand

name: Long Bow
effect:
Bow • Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
"One target, one arrow. Anything more is a waste of time." - Gueniveure of House Glyn

name: Long Sword
effect:
Weapon • Fighter and rogue only.
"The elves were geased by an Andover wizard not to use their sorcery for one hundred years. Now, that time has passed... and the Elves have risen for vengeance." - Keziah

name: Lord Gahid Rellion
effect:
Deverenian Warlord • Unique • Rellion
Your army rolls two dice for initiative, keeping either one.
The Empire will live no more in the folds of silence, but as a thunder that causes the heavens to tremble.

name: Lothian, Law Hammer
effect:
Weapon • Unique
Only Deverenians may equip
While equipped this characters gains +1 hit point and an extra melee strike when attacking equal to his or her highest ATK strike.
Order: Discard to ready this character.
"It is the weapon of the Emperor himself, passed down to his chosen Champion." - Lord Gahid of Rellion

name: Loyal Nag
effect:
Steed • Order: Spend the Loyal Nag to move forward or backward one Rank.
"Too bad she can't cook."

name: Loyalty's Reward
effect:
Spend Order: Draw two cards.
"Once Alia of Rowan was a queen, but fires and fortunes have stripped the lady of everything - including honor." - Count Damien

name: Lucien Stormcrow
effect:
Elf • Ranger
"One hundred years... did you think we would forget so easily? Our oath is fulfilled, and it is time to show you humans how well we remember. I will give you one cut for each year, on the body of your king."

name: Maddawc
effect:
Nothrog • Krun's Legion
I fight for victory. I fight for blood. I fight for Krun - he will give me both.

name: Madriga's Defense
effect:
React: Play before a melee strike roll targeting this fighter. Roll the die. If your opponent's melee strike roll is not higher than your roll (ignoring all modifiers), the strike automatically fails.
Try as I might, I couldn't lay a hand on her!

name: Mage Armor
effect:
React: Play before a melee strike or ranged strike roll targeting a character in this wizard's rank. The character gains +3 AC until the end of the turn.
"It was an ancient shield, of strange design... I felt my hammer clang against it, staggered back from the blow, and when I looked again, it was gone." - Loner

name: Maidenhair Serpent
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
It had a thousand fingers, and a thousand hands, and they all reached out to me at once. All the time the beast was whispering with my dead wife's voice, "Come to me... come to me... "

name: Mail of Virtue
effect:
Armor • React: Spend the Mail of Virtue after this character suffers wounds. Reduce the wounds by one.
"It lies in the Temple of Katal, guarded by a demon the size of three horses. I doubt we shall see it again in our lifetime, my friend." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Marcos Genecourt
effect:
Deverenian • Lord of Genecourt
Marcos has +1 level for equipping items.
To know a thing, first thou must possess that thing... and so it shall be for the Empire.

name: Mass Blessing
effect:
Order: Target one rank in your army. Until the end of the turn, all characters gain ATK and AC bonuses equal to this cleric's level while in that rank.
"Three sons, Gnorrow, and countless brothers-in-arms. I sent them out to death, and now their faces haunt me... " - King Xod

name: Master Anandale
effect:
Deverenian • Aedroud
React: Once per turn, before Anandale makes a melee strike roll, his opponent becomes spent
"Fifty years ago, on a bloody battlefield, I swore an oath to guard the Empire. I will never forget it Gahid, no matter how much the Emperor tries to forget me."

name: Maxmillian
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Summoner • Unique
If your Warlord is killed while Maxmillian is in play, Maxmillian gains the trait Warlord and you do not lose the game. If Maxmillian is killed while he has the trait Warlord, you lose the game.
There are no more kings, no senates and no justice in any land Robert. Watch your back.

name: Meet At the Inn!
effect:
Order: All players may draw a card. You may draw an additional card. (2
total)
"Come on, guys! I have an overwhelming urge to go to the nearest inn and meet a pair of strange travelers who will help us with out quest!" "What, so soon after our two friends died?"

name: Meteor Swarm
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to 2 ranks away. All characters in the target's rank must succeed a magic save (DC 13) or suffer one wound.
"Choose thy words carefully, Lord Gahid. No man insults me and lives." - Slayer the Unkind

name: Minor Regeneration
effect:
Spend React: Play after a character in this cleric's army (including the cleric) is killed. Shuffle the character back into your deck.
"Three days of complete rest, and you'll be as good as new." - Darian Windson

name: Mirror Image
effect:
Order: Target this wizard or a character in this rank or an adjacent rank. Until the end of the turn, before any melee strike roll or ranged strike roll targeting Mirror Image's target, the opposing character must succeed with a perception check (DC 15) or else the melee strike or ranged strike misses.
"Catch me if you can, Deverenian." - Strongarm

name: Mixed Potion
effect:
Order: Once per turn, equip the Potion to another character in this rank,
ignoring class.
Order: Discard the Mixed Potion to produce a random effect. Roll a die: 1: Turns into a frog and is killed. 2-6: suffers 1 wound. 7-12: +3 ATK/+3 AC until the end of the turn. 13-17: +1 hit point, permanently. 18-20: +1 level, +3 ATK, +3 AC, +1 hit point, permanently.

name: Narawat Ring
effect:
Whenever this character performs a ranged strike from a spell, add +4 to the die roll.
"My people were fine diplomats, but better archers. Negotiate when you are close, and when you are far away... " - Baqbou Umbala

name: Nice Try
effect:
React: Play after an opponent performs a react during a melee strike targeting this fighter. If the fighter succeeds with a Perception skill check (DC 10), the react is canceled.
With three swift strikes, the beast leapt upon her. Its claws tore through silk and air, but never once touched bone.

name: Nimble Fingers
effect:
Order: If this rogue is in the 1st rank, the rogue performs a sneak test
(DC 9). If successful, the rogue targets an item up to two ranks away, which
is discarded. If unsuccessful, the rogue is killed.
"Watch thy weapons, and thy lives. There's a thief about." - Sir Diotram

name: Not Fast Enough
effect:
React: Play before this rogue makes a melee strike roll. Choose one item on the defender. The item has no effect on play (is considered blank) until the end of the strike.
"Just avoid their sword arm. After that, a Deverenian isn't much more than a big pile of tin. Slow-moving tin at that." - Rora Blackmane

name: Nothrog Armor
effect:
Armor
"It's easy to wear, as long as you can avoid bleeding to death on your own spikes." - Strongarm

name: Only Ruined My Shield
effect:
React: Play after this fighter suffers wounds. Discard a Shield or Armor the fighter has equipped to reduce the wounds by one.
"I hate to think what would have happened if I hadn't been under a flag of truce!"

name: Orochoff
effect:
Nothrog
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
Logan smiled. "Don't worry, Serah. One day he'll fall with all his precious messages. When he does we'll be a pack of wolves on the forest floor... and he'll never fly again."

name: Overhand Block
effect:
React: Play after a melee strike roll targeting this fighter. The fighter
gains +2 AC for this strike.
You are weary, human. Give up now, and your death will be swift. Fight, and
it will be an eternity until the dawn.

name: Padrig
effect:
Nothrog • Shaman • Hate's Legion
Spend Order: Look at the top card of any player's deck.
"I have seen the future, and it has been bound by chains of iron."

name: Palethis
effect:
Elf
Spend Order: Move to any rank in your army if the move will not create an
illegal rank.
He goes about the business of the noble houses, watching the war unfold and trying not to think of the human that once saved his life.

name: Phar'Dunn
effect:
Nothrog
Phar'Dunn may only move backward using a card effect.
"They call him 'The Ogre', and for good reason. He besieges the south wall at Baraxton... alone." - Axe

name: Phonstone
effect:
This character gains +3 AC while he or she is the target of a melee strike or ranged strike from a character of the opposite alignment.
"Remember, Alia, that love is no part of the final dream. Love ages, and withers in darkness; it is a great hunger, and passion can be cruel." - Rathe

name: Poison
effect:
Dwarf • Assassin
"Poison takes a bit of clothing from each of his victims - a memory of his duties to the King. He has made a patchwork cloak of his murders, and calls it the defense of a nation." - Kohn Peacehand

name: Poison Dagger
effect:
Weapon • React: Spend the Dagger after this character fails a melee strike roll to make another melee strike roll at ATK +0.
"One day, Tepheroth, you will turn and find me behind you, my father's blade shining with your blood." - Taraniel

name: Poison Dart
effect:
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike that ignores AC bonuses from items.
"All too easy, Sir Dinnian. Thou art a fool to think I could care about thee enough to turn over my brother - and now, thou shalt be a dead fool." - Lady Elaneor Tremayne

name: Poisoned Blade
effect:
React: Play before this rogue makes a melee strike roll. The target of the rogue's strike must roll a die. If the roll is greater than their printed AC (without modifiers), the target immediately has -4 ATK and -3 AC permanently.
"If you have a mercenary for a friend, you don't need any enemies."

name: Poorman's Bow
effect:
Bow • Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.
"I give you ten to one it breaks before you get the arrow away." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Potion of Shrinking
effect:
Order: Discard the Potion of Shrinking to target a character in this rank who gains +5 AC and suffers -5 ATK until the end of the turn.
In the marshes of Myreth lives a hag so rancid that even the touch of her cold fingers will kill a man. Yet she brews such potions that many still seek her out... and some even manage to return.

name: Power Word: Kill
effect:
React: Play before a melee strike roll targeting this wizard. The wizard's opponent must succeed with a magic save (DC 20) or suffer 2 wounds.
"Whispers can cut like knives."

name: Precise Shot
effect:
React: Play before this rogue makes a ranged strike roll. Add this rogue's ATK (without modifiers from Weapons) to the die roll.
"Even dragons have eyes." - Rathe

name: Prepared for Battle
effect:
Order: If this fighter has an Armor, a Weapon, and a Steed equipped, then he or she gets +6 ATK and +6 AC until the end of the turn.
In his youth, the Emperor was one of the greatest knights of Deverenia. Age, and time have stolen the sharpness of his blade, and now he is only an old man with a fading Empire.

name: Prince Alaric
effect:
Dwarf • Alaric has +1 AC for each adjacent cleric.
When you have an illegal rank, you may immediately put Prince Alaric into play from your hand into the rank in front of the illegal rank if your Warlord is a Dwarf.
Strength is in the body, in courage and steel, Knowledge. So my father taught me.

name: Princess Dashkova
effect:
Deverenian • Unique
Spend React: After any die roll, reroll the die.
"The Emperor's daughter delivers his messages to the men on the battlefield and guides their assault from her carriage. She may not lift a sword, but she's already slaughtered a thousand souls." - King Xod

name: Push
effect:
Spend React: Play after a character moves into or out of the 1st rank to cancel the move.
"I don't know why he helped me. I only know that I was suddenly across the river, and the Dwarf was alone with the Nothrog." - Euain

name: Put to the Test
effect:
React: Play before this fighter equips an item. The fighter has +1 level for equipping this item.
"Aw, c'mon, lad. It's just a sword." - Uther, Killer-Of-Bears

name: Quinthe
effect:
Elf • House Syneri
Whenever Quinthe kills a wizard of the same level or higher with a melee strike
or spell, he gains +1 level, permanently.
"Llyr has fallen, as has Andover. We must hunt down the rest of these
'humans' my Queen, and rid the world of their pestilence."

name: Rage
effect:
Dwarf • Blackstone Raider
Order: Once per turn, Rage gains +4 ATK and -4 AC until the end of the turn.
Death is my freedom.

name: Rahku Mennanakh
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Rathe
Fighters adjacent to Rahku have +2 ATK
"A charging legion of Rathemen once made the earth shake. Then they fought the dwarves for the mountain passes, and now a handful of scattered soldiers is all that is left of Rathe." - Keziah

name: Rathe
effect:
Elf Warlord • Unique
Order: Discard a card from your hand to move forward or backward one rank
For too long, I slept the ageless sleep of the dead only to awaken at the first taste of blood upon Elven ground. I have dreamed of new paths... and dark lores of revenge.

name: Relentless
effect:
Order: Move this rogue forward or backward one rank. If the rogue moves into the 1st rank, he or she may immediately attack.
"I'd rather fight beside a human than die to a Nothrog... but don't make me think about it for long." - Lucien Stormcrow

name: Reserves
effect:
React: Play after a character in your army is killed, creating an illegal rank.
Put a character from your hand into play in the rank in front of the illegal rank. If the character's level is greater than the rank, the character is
stunned. You may not play a character that you could not legally play with your army's current formation."
"Let the dwarves have the mountains. I have too many wounded, too few to bear the burden of our protection, to worry about their 'quest'." - Sir Robert the Vigilant

name: Riding Horse
effect:
Steed • Order: Spend the Riding Horse to move forward one rank.
"Nothrog ride wolves because nobody told them horses weren't for eating." - Rora Blackmane.

name: Righteous Faith
effect:
React: Play after this cleric rolls a die to add 3 to the result.
"May the strength of the Storm be within thy good arm, and the wind of holy righteousness follow thee all the days of thy life." - Deverenian blessing

name: Ring of Vorn
effect:
Order: Spend the Ring of Vorn to move any character in this rank forward or backward one rank.
"You first, wizard." - Hassimal

name: Robe of the Wind
effect:
Armor • This character gains an additional +6 AC (+8 AC total) against ranged strikes.
Within each thing of magic lies a dream of Dragon soul.

name: Rod of Roaring Flames
effect:
Order: Spend the Rod of Roaring Flames to perform a +0 ranged strike. Add this
character's level to the roll.
"Nafcallisar!" the dwarf shouted, and a torrent of flame ripped from his wand, charring the undead to ash.

name: Rogue's Blade
effect:
Weapon • Rogue's Blade gives no ATK bonus during a melee strike against an opponent with Armor equipped. +2 skill.
"Tell me, Dwarf. If absolute power corrupts absolutely then where does that
leave your God?" - Absinthe

name: Rren'the
effect:
Nothrog • Ranger • Elite Hate Guard
Rren'the may equip 2 Weapons.
When we are done with you and your city, human, there will be nothing left
except red snow...

name: Run Him Through
effect:
Spend React: Play before a character in this rank makes a melee strike roll. The character gains +3 ATK for this strike.
"In truth, it grieves me to see so false a thief meet so fair an end." - Sir Marcos Genecourt

name: Rune
effect:
Order: This wizard targets a Weapon. The weapon gains +4 ATK permanently. Place this card with the weapon. A weapon may not have more than one war rune.
"Carve it on the steel, but never the flesh. The one will cut through, the other will melt away." - Fett Anjaran

name: Sacrifice
effect:
React: Play after a character in this cleric's army suffers one or more wounds. The cleric suffers the wounds instead.
"A man will often feel an itch in a limb that has been removed. I wonder, Robert, what will you feel of Cassandra's love, when I have taken her from you?" - Maxmilian

name: Sali
effect:
Free Kingdoms
"She has stolen the secret of the Deverenian hawks, and escaped to the Free Kingdoms with little more than her life. It will not be long before the Emperor's guard finds her... and us." -Timothy Windson

name: Sand in Your Eyes
effect:
React: Play before a melee strike roll targeting this rogue. The rogue's opponent suffers a -5 ATK penalty until the end of this turn.
"Don't fight fair. That's like saying your enemy's as good as you, and worth respect." - Kenia

name: Sandstone Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
You must have a cleric in your army to bring Sandstone Gargoyle into play.
Made of stone, the gargoyles don't get tired, they don't retreat, and they don't know fear.

name: Scavenge
effect:
React: Play when this rogue is equipping an item. The rogue has +1 level for equipping this item.
"What's wrong with taking a sword or two, an our squires have need? These Free Kingdom curs shan't be using weapons henceforth." - Lady Elaneor

name: Scout Pony
effect:
Steed • Order: Spend the Scout Pony to move forward or backward one rank.
"You can't win a war through ignorance." - Sir Robert the Vigilant

name: Serah ni Fhionn
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Daughter of Llyr
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.
"Serah has been forged in the fires of Llyr, and the flames have hardened her heart to stone." - Logan Ebonwoulfe.

name: Sethusk
effect:
Nothrog • Krun's Legion
Spend Order: Draw a card
"Checkmate. Baraxton falls." The Nothrog didn't even bother to reach for his sword. "You die."

name: Shade Harpy
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Harpy
Shade Harpy gains +2 ATK for each other Shade Harpy in this rank.
"When a harpy sings her head off, she usually improves her appearance." - Basil Nemis

name: Shatter
effect:
Order: If this wizard is in the 1st rank, target an item in any army's 1st rank. The target item is discarded.
"Nice weapon. Hope you weren't attached to it." - Quinthe

name: Shield Bash
effect:
React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. The fighter gains +6 ATK for this strike.
"War does not call for heroes - it creates them from the blood and bone of lesser men." - Lord Anandale

name: Shield Block
effect:
React: Play after this fighter suffers wounds. Discard a Shield the fighter has equipped to reduce the wounds to zero.
"Nothrog make good smiths. Their shields can be expensive, but at least they aren't made out of the hide of the last man they killed." - Kerebrus

name: Shield Wall
effect:
Mercenary
Shield Wall may not attack. Shield Wall and adjacent characters have +10 AC versus ranged strikes.
"We stole it from the Nothrog. You should've seen their faces when they saw their god's horns pointed at them for a change." - Johan Halfblood

name: Short Bow
effect:
Bow • Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
"The harder you work, the luckier you get." - Angus Hammerfall

name: Short Sword
effect:
Weapon • Fighter and rogue only.
"The scouts have returned, Lord, and bless their speed, for the Nothrog are
at their very heels!" - Squire Edonloc

name: Signon's Armor
effect:
Armor • This character may not be targeted by ranged strikes.
"And the breath of the Dragon did enfold him, and sheathe him in a steel so fine that not arrow nor dagger's pierce could cut away its scale." - the Annales Devereniorum

name: Sir Diotram
effect:
Deverenian
Sir Diotram is +1 level for equipping items.
"He is a crow, and doth circle the battlefield - the last arrival, and the last to leave." - Lady Ersane

name: Sir Euain
effect:
Deverenian
Euain may enter play in any rank of your army.
I go where I please, and with whom I please. An thou not like it, minstrel, then I shall feed thee to my wolves!

name: Sir Robert the Vigilant
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord • Unique • Duke of Andover
You may bring Free Kingdoms characters higher than 3rd level into play as if they were 1 level lower.
They say it is the blood of the soldier that makes a general great. I pray that is not true else I will be remembered as the greatest general in history.

name: Sir Sorlons d'Ilchant
effect:
Deverenian • The Azure Knight • Rellion
Order: Discard an equipped item from Sir Sorlons to move forward or backward one rank.
Trust thyself only, and another shall not betray thee.

name: Sir Wallence
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Spend Order: Stun Sir Wallence to make a melee strike from the 2nd rank as
if he were in the 1st rank.
It's a matter of survival. Live men don't see me coming and the dead don't bother to watch me go. This war won't be won by honor, Robert. The sooner you learn that, the sooner our men stop dying.

name: Slayer the Unkind
effect:
Deverenian Warlord • Unique
Order: Once per turn, kill another character in your army to ready Slayer the Unkind.
Control the past, and you will command the future.

name: Slovien
effect:
Elf • Undead
Whenever Slovien kills a character with a melee strike or a spell, he immediately gains 1 hit point permanently.
"An elf that doth wish to live beyond his years hath but two choices; deal with death or steal another's life." - Lady Beatrix

name: Smite
effect:
React: Play after a character in this cleric's army makes a melee strike roll targeting a cleric of the opposite alignment to this cleric's. Reroll the die.
"Don't waste your time looking for immortality, Elf. You aren't even going to live to see tomorrow." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Smoke Bomb
effect:
Order: Until the end of the turn, before each melee strike roll or ranged strike roll targeting this rogue, the opposing character must succeed with a perception check (DC 15) or else the rogue gains +7 AC for the strike.
"Nothrog have better eyesight than you poor humans. But don't worry - at least you'll die slowly." - L'sara

name: Soft Leather Armor
effect:
Armor • May not be equipped by a wizard.
"That's really inexpensive." The scout smiled. "What did you say this hide was, again?"

name: Sorscha
effect:
Mercenary Warlord • Monster • Summoner • Unique
Order: Once per turn, search your deck for a card with the Monster trait, show it to the other players, then put the Monster on top of your deck

name: Spell Book
effect:
This character is +1 level for casting spells. Whenever this character casts spells, the DC of magic saves for those spells is increased by +2.
"Devastation is an art." - Slayer the Unkind

name: Spite
effect:
React: Play after a character adjacent to this fighter is killed by a melee strike. The fighter immediately targets the attacking character with a melee strike. Only one Spite may be played for each character killed.
"Tyraniel, once the lands of House Rowan." Lord Gahid smiled, ad clenched an iron fist. "Ours."

name: Squire Edonloc
effect:
Deverenian
Born of a noble house, he struggles to prove his name worthy of knighthood.

name: Squire Kelanor
effect:
Deverenian
"Go into Myreth, noble Kelanor. Bring to me the Dragon's skull that rests atop Tepheroth's throne. Then, and only then, wilt thou be worthy to stand at my side." - Lord Gahid

name: Staff
effect:
Weapon • This character gains +3 AC while he or she is the target of a melee strike or ranged strike by a character of the opposite alignment.
"They are easy to make, these trinkets, but useful... very useful." - Padrig

name: Staff of War
effect: Weapon • You may have 2 more characters in this rank than normal before the rank is illegal, so long as there is at least one character in the rank in front of this one.

name: Stinking Cloud
effect:
Order: If this wizard is in the 1st rank, target an army. Until the end of the turn, all characters have -3 ATK and -2 AC penalties while in the target army's first rank.
The great city of Baraxton was not entirely without defenses, as the Nothrog quickly discovered.

name: Stone
effect:
Dwarf
"You were his shieldman." Xod said gravely, his son's body pale upon the stone bier. "You were trusted with his protection, and yet you live, and he is gone. May your deeds weigh upon you like a stone into water, and may peace never know your true name."

name: Strike True
effect:
React: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll. The fighter gains +10 ATK for this strike, but suffers one wound after the strike.
"I'll gladly give my life to defeat you Deverenian. Your army has only two commanders; the Free Kingdoms have hundreds more like me."

name: Strongarm
effect:
Dwarf
Roll a die after each time Strongarm casts a spell. If the roll is odd, he suffers one wound.
If pain brings victory, then gladly will I suffer for my king.

name: Summon Avatar
effect: Spend Order: Put this card in your 1st rank as a level 5 fighter with ATK +10, AC 20, and 3 hit points. The Avatar is killed at the end of the turn. The Avatar has the ability: "Spend Order: Target any character of level 3 or less in the 1st rank of any army. Kill the target."

name: Summon Champion
effect:
Spend Order: Put this card in your 1st rank as a level 3 fighter with ATK +5, AC 14, and 1 hit point. The champion is killed at the end of the turn. If this wizard has the Summoner trait, the Champion is killed at the end of the next turn.
"It rose from the smoke with a challenge of fire, and I levied my sword against it with the ice of righteous purpose." - Sir Sorlons d'Ilchant

name: Summon Guardian
effect: Spend Order: Put this card in your 1st rank as an Undead level 2 fighter with ATK +3, AC 12, and 1 hit point. The Guardian is killed at the end of the turn. If the wizard has the Summoner trait, the Guardian is killed at the end of next turn.

name: Summon Imp
effect:
Spend Order: Put this card in your 1st rank as a level 1 fighter with ATK +2, AC 10, and 2 hit points. The Imp is killed at the end of the turn.
"Imps are immortal. Discover their true names and they are condemned to an eternity of servitude."

name: Summon Monster
effect:
Spend Order: Search your deck for a card with the Monster trait, show it to the other players, and place it on top of your deck. If this wizard has the Summoner trait, the Monster goes into your hand.
"As simple as cutting away innocence." - Slayer the Unkind

name: Swift
effect:
Order: Move this rogue forward or backward one rank.
"I don't have to outrun the Nothrog, old man. I only have to be faster than you." - Black Tom of Corinth

name: Sword of Chaos
effect:
Weapon • Unique
Whenever this character rolls a natural 20 on a melee strike roll, he or she may immediately perform an additional melee strike after this one.
It feeds upon your strength before it takes the blood of your enemies, and in its wake leaves a trail of soulless men.

name: Sword of the North
effect:
Weapon • Unique
Order: Spend Sword of the North to move forward one rank.
Order: Spend Sword of the North to gain +4 ATK until the end of the turn.
Order: Spend Sword of the North to gain an additional melee strike (ATK +0) until the end of the turn.

name: Symbol of Kor
effect:
This character is +1 level for casting spells and gains +2 for magic saves.
When first we saw it, it was covered with earth; after the battle of Nyothes, it was stained with blood. Do not trust these butchering Dwarves. They have no concept of honor.

name: Takh
effect:
Nothrog • Uthanak's Legion
Takh can equip one fighter item.
A soul can be forged and shaped like steel; its anvil is pain and chaos. The stronger the soul, the deadlier the blade...

name: Tales at the Inn
effect:
React: Play after a character with less than half of this fighter's ATK hits him or her with a melee strike. (Negative ATK is considered a zero). The strike automatically fails.
"I swear it! The beast... beasts, I say, because there were, uhm, two of them! Twenty feet high, and as red as a sunset! Look at this scar! Don't you believe me?"

name: Tanner Trollson
effect:
Mercenary
He says his knife's for skinning - not fur, but Deverenian mail.

name: Taoth's Axemen
effect:
Nothrog • Taoth's Legion
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.
"Ten legions of Nothrog fight at Captain Taoth's command. I'd wager the city of Baraxton has three days left. No more." - Darian Windson

name: Taraniel
effect:
Free Kingdoms • House Rowan
Order: Once per turn, move backward one rank.
He has cut his hair, forsaken his past and given his sword to his son. Now he has only two reason to live: his lady, and his vengeance against the High Queen.

name: Taunt
effect:
Order: This rogue targets a character in the 1st rank of another army. The target must attack and target the rogue with a melee strike at his or her first opportunity this turn.
Utinam logica falsa tuam philosophiam totam suffodiant!

name: Tears of the Storm
effect:
Spend Order: Target a character in play and remove one wound from that character.
"I've seen the Deverenian clerics collect rain in a golden chalice, and use it to heal their soldiers. The Storm is more than a mere darkness on the horizon... "

name: Teleport
effect:
Order: This wizard targets a character. Move the target forward or backward one rank as long as the move will not create an illegal rank. This wizard may not target a character of equal or greater level in an opposing army.

name: Tepheroth
effect:
Elf Warlord • Unique • Necromancer • High Queen • House Calix
All elves in your army can cast level 1 wizard spells.
Death is seduction. Embrace it, call it to your cold heart, make it your own.

name: Test of Faith
effect:
React: Play after this cleric makes a melee strike roll to reroll the die.
Where there is no hope left, there is also no fear.

name: The Beast Knight
effect:
Deverenian
Your army gains +2 to its initiative roll.
He hunts for souls, seeking to steal a shadow of humanity, while his own has been forever lost.

name: The Better Part of Valor
effect:
React: Play before a melee strike roll targeting this rogue. The strike is cancelled. The rogue must move back at least one rank, but may move back any number of ranks.

name: The King's Lady
effect:
Weapon • This character inflicts an additional wound whenever he or she hits with a melee strike.

name: Theoloc
effect:
Deverenian
Theoloc has +1 level while Slayer is in his army. This does not affect Theoloc entering play.
He struggles day and night with his magic hoping that he will not join the row of whispering skulls that hang above the Masters door.

name: Throw
effect:
Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
"Don't count a Nightwalker dead, you fool. Not unless they're in more pieces than their armor." - Black Tom of Corinth

name: Thunic Wyvern
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Wyvern may use rogue action cards.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward a rank.
"They be lesser cousins to Dragons, which means one is only about twice as smart as thou and I." - Sir Diotram

name: Timber Wolf
effect:
Order: When in the 1st Rank, spend the Wolf to have it attack as a level 1 rogue with AC 10, 1 hit point, and ATK of +1.
"We will seize fate by the throat and steal death from its jaws." - Serah ni Fhionn

name: Timothy Windson
effect:
Free Kingdoms
I was there when the Elves destroyed Sir Robert's armies. We thought we were ready, but there was nothing we could do against them. Sometimes, at night, I can still hear the sentries screaming...

name: To Fight Another Day
effect:
React: Play before a melee strike roll targeting this rogue. If moving back one rank will not create an illegal rank, the strike is cancelled and this rogue moves back one rank.
"You cannot defeat Death... but you can chain him." - High Queen Tepheroth

name: To Me!!
effect:
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn all other characters gain +1 ATK and +1 AC bonuses while in the same rank as this fighter.
"I don't know what effect these men will have on the enemy, but by the Storm, they frighten me."

name: Too Fast to See
effect:
React: Play after a melee strike roll or ranged strike roll targeting this rogue. The die result is changed to a 'natural 1'.

name: Toren Yscar
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Seer • Seer of Distant Realms
Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand to look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may take one of those cards and add it to your hand. Return the remaining cards in the same order.
Do not ask, and I will not answer.

name: True Aim
effect: React: Play before this fighter makes a ranged strike roll. Add +2 to the die roll. Add an additional +3 (+5 total) to the die roll if this fighter is a Ranger.

name: Truth
effect:
Dwarf • Priest of Kor
Spend Order: Give a target character either +3 ATK or +3 AC until the end of the turn.
The uplanders have sown the wind; they shall reap the storm.

name: Tsinanok
effect:
Nothrog • Shieldman
Characters adjacent to Tsinanok have +1 AC.
"Nothrog legions live and die together on the battlefield. The best of them will jump into fire to save a comrade. When you see a Nothrog shieldman, be sure to look around for his friends." - Hassimal

name: Turn Undead
effect:
Order: Target an Undead character of equal or lower level than this cleric. Stun the target
"Begone, lest Kor hurl you back to the Abyss from whence you came!" - Knowledge

name: Turned to Stone
effect:
Spend Order: This wizard targets a character up to two ranks away. The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 17) or suffer two wounds.
"Oh, heavenly spirits. Not again." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Uthanak
effect:
Nothrog Warlord • Unique
Order: Once per turn, move a Nothrog in your army forward or backward one rank.
Raise the black banner, and shed blood for the gods of war!

name: Uther Killer-of-Bears
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Barbarian • Tribe of Swords

was before the Nothrog sacked their villages. When this war is done, they'll
be lucky to be remembered at all." - Basil Nemis

name: Vahdrok the Crippler
effect:
Mercenary • Unique • Monster
"The beast be big as a tree, and hits like a mountain! I'll not go back to that forest Uthanak - not in all my years!" - Last words of an unknown Nothrog

name: Valanthe
effect:
ATK +0/+0/+0 AC 9 Skills +0 Hit Points 1
Elf • House Calix
She is more cunning than the pets she trains, and far more deadly. Those who fight the elves would do well to remember that Valanthe's poison comes in two forms: the sting, and the smile.

name: Varg
effect:
Nothrog • Barbarian
Varg may enter play as if he were 3rd level, but becomes spent.
"I remember your Baraxton wife, human scum... she was the one who begged for mercy. She found none, nor will you."

name: Vedisalaron
effect:
Elf • Undead • Necromancer • Spiritkeeper

name: Virtue
effect:

"Righteousness exalteth a nation." - Lady Meleagrance

name: Wall of Air
effect:

"It was so bad, I couldn't tell if I took aim at my sister, or the Elves!"

name: War Horse
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend the War Horse to move forward one rank.
Order: Spend the War Horse to give this character an additional +2 ATK until the end of the turn.

name: Web
effect:

"House Rowan is destroyed, by the order of the High Queen." The sorcerer smiled, and the sticky strands quickly smothered the still-screaming scouts.

name: Whispershot
effect:
Elf
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.
"He does not speak. His bow speaks for him." - Gueniveure of House Glyn

name: Wyvernskin Robe
effect:
Armor • Cursed
All other wizards in your army are +1 for casting spells

name: Wyvernsting Bow
effect:
Bow
Order: Spend the Wyvernsting Bow to perform a +3 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.

Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Xiat
effect:
Nothrog • Druid

"If you should fall, another will replace you, and the power of the Nothrog will continue on beyond your name." - Krun

name: Yanthorine
effect:
Elf
Yanthorine is +1 level for casting spells.
"She sits alone by the water, waiting for it to show her Elven dreams, but the images are fading, and the words are lost in blood." - Cordeos

name: Yedraw's Tooth
effect:
Weapon

"Yedraw was my father. His blade killed a nation of warriors in honorable combat. Question its power, and I will repeat the task... beginning with you." - Kerebrus

name: Zoe
effect:
Mercenary
Spend Order: Target a character, who gains +1 hit point until the end of the turn.
My sons, my grandsons, they said I was too old to go to the battle. They died, one by one, and I find that the war has come to me.
